author: Alexander Browne
message:
Thanks for this! It's just about everything I want in a notes app without anything more. I had trouble with the build dependencies, so I'm happy for the deb package. It works well on Ubuntu 18.10.

If I have a few suggestions would you be OK with Github issues? Or would that just be extra stress for a personal project?

replies.author: Aurélien Gâteau
replies.message:
Great to hear! Feel free to file GitHub issues, but:
- I want to keep Nanonote light, so I may say no ;
- It may take me a long time to work on it, I run too many projects :)

author: Ade Malsasa Akbar
message: Congratulations! Tested Nanonote immediately on KDE neon 5.14.4 and it works very well. By the way, I got this post from Danigm's Outreachy post. Thanks for your hard work.
